court: HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM
outcome: /JUDGMENT IN CC 2347/2009 of ADDL.C.J.M., ERNAKULAM CRIME NO. 332/2008 OF PANANGAD POLICE STATION , ERNAKULAM PETITIONERS: 1 ANEESH S/O. MURALEEDHARAN, KACHETHU HOUSE, ENTHEYAR, KOOTTIKKAL, KOTTAYAM.
full_text: | CIEE ey IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 2018/KER/247 PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MRS. JUSTICE ANNIE JOHN THURSDAY, THE 4TH DAY OF JANUARY 2018 / 14TH POUSHA, 1939 Crl.MC.No. 5344 of 2013 AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN CC 2347/2009 of ADDL.C.J.M., ERNAKULAM CRIME NO. 332/2008 OF PANANGAD POLICE STATION , ERNAKULAM PETITIONERS: 1 ANEESH S/O. MURALEEDHARAN, KACHETHU HOUSE, ENTHEYAR, KOOTTIKKAL, KOTTAYAM. 2 ANSHAD, S/O. IBRAHIM, CHERIKKAL HOUSE, ENTHAYAR, KOOTTICKAL, KOTTAYAM. BY ADV.SRI.E.D.GEORGE RESPONDENT : STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM. R BY SRI RAJASEKHARAN NAIR T., PUBLIC PROSECUTOR THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON 04-01-2018, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Bee 2018/KER/247 Crl.MC.No. 5344 of 2013 () APPENDIX PETITIONER(S) EXHIBITS ANNEXURE Al : COPY OF THE CHARGE IN FIR NO.332/08 OF PANANGADU POLICE STATION. Cri. M.C. No. 5344 of 2013 Dated this the 4" day of January, 2018. ORDER The petitioners are accused Nos. 3 and 4 in C.C. No. 2347 of 2009 on the file of the Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate Court, Ernakulam. The offences alleged against the petitioners are under Section 67 of the Information Technology Act and Section 34 of IPC. 2. The case of the prosecution is that the first accused was standing in the Vyttila bus stop and playing some obscene pictures in his mobile and the police arrested him on getting some reliable information. While questioned, he said that the picture was received from the mobile shop of the second accused. The petitioners were seen working in the mobile shop of the second accused and thereafter, they were implicated as accused Nos. 3 and 4. 3. The learned counsel for the petitioners submitted that there is no allegation against the petitioners in the charge and they were unnecessarily dragged before the Magistrate Court. Hence, they have filed this Crl. M.C seeking to quash Annexure Al charge in C.C. No. 2347 of 2009 pending before the Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate Court, Ernakulam. 4. This Crl. M.C was filed in the year 2013. To a query whether the case is pending before the trial court, it was reported that this case was originally filed before the Addl. Chief Judicial Magistrate, a a0) wn re peers 2018/KER/247 Crl.M.C. No. 5344/2013 ~2- Ernakulam and was transferred to Judicial First Class Magistrate Court, Maradu on 10.04.2015 and it was re-numbered as C.C. No. 683 of 2015 and the case is now posted to 29.01.2008 for FSL report. 5. Today, when the matter was taken up, the learned counsel for the petitioners submit that the petitioners want to withdraw the Crl.M.C., with liberty to file afresh. Accordingly, this Crl.M.C is dismissed as withdrawn without prejudice to the right of the petitioners to move afresh, if so advised. ANNIE JOHN, JUDGE. rv Bue | CIEE ey 2018/KER/247 Cri.M.C.
